# h3_ovn_vpc (Resource)

Manages H3 Cloud OVN VPC



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) VPC name
- `project_id` (String) Project ID (UUID)

### Optional

- `namespaces` (List of String) List of namespaces attached to VPC
- `static_routes` (Attributes List) Static routes for VPC (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--static_routes))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) VPC ID
- `status` (String) VPC status

<a id="nestedatt--static_routes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `static_routes`

Required:

- `cidr` (String) Destination CIDR
- `next_hop_ip` (String) Next hop IP address

Optional:

- `policy` (String) Routing policy
